channel.title: What do you think of weed(Marijuana)
channel.description: Sorry if there is another topic but what are your views on making this legal? Personally I would love it to be legal to smoke it :)

item.title: What do you think of weed(Marijuana)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

just like with alchohol, you’re more likely to die/get in trouble from doing stupid shit while high, not from the actual drug

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think of weed(Marijuana)

item.title: What do you think of weed(Marijuana)
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:69, topic:436015”][quote author=Dj_ link=topic=538738.msg3946541#msg3946541 date=1331924690]

Legalize it, tax it, profit from it.

Most sane person here, a blunt wont kill you, and even if it could, then good. We are running out of space as it is. It’s why I think it’s fine to sell cigarettes, everyone knows the harm, what you do, you do to yourself.

it takes you to smoke your body weight for weed to o/d and kill you. so weed is harmless really… im sure no one can sit down and smoke 100+ pounds of weed in a short period of time.
[/quote]
Thats a lie, even if it were true which its not… the skins etc needed to smoke that much would either kill you or you’d pass out. Remember smoking gives off small values of carbon monoxide the more u smoke the more thats in you. You get it from ANY time of smoke.[/quote]
With that logic, you can die from burning candles. And iirc, you have to consume 1/3 of your body weight in marijuana in 15 minutes to die.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think of weed(Marijuana)

item.description:

[quote=“Dj_, post:61, topic:436015”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=538738.msg3946340#msg3946340 date=1331907931]

Legalize it, tax it, profit from it.

Most sane person here, a blunt wont kill you, and even if it could, then good. We are running out of space as it is. It’s why I think it’s fine to sell cigarettes, everyone knows the harm, what you do, you do to yourself.
[/quote]
it takes you to smoke your body weight for weed to o/d and kill you. so weed is harmless really… im sure no one can sit down and smoke 100+ pounds of weed in a short period of time.[/quote]
Thats a lie, even if it were true which its not… the skins etc needed to smoke that much would either kill you or you’d pass out. Remember smoking gives off small values of carbon monoxide the more u smoke the more thats in you. You get it from ANY time of smoke.

Most sane person here, a blunt wont kill you, and even if it could, then good. We are running out of space as it is. It’s why I think it’s fine to sell cigarettes, everyone knows the harm, what you do, you do to yourself.
[/quote]
it takes you to smoke your body weight for weed to o/d and kill you. so weed is harmless really… im sure no one can sit down and smoke 100+ pounds of weed in a short period of time.[/quote]

item.title: What do you think of weed(Marijuana)
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:66, topic:436015”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=538738.msg3946704#msg3946704 date=1331931136]

No difference from alcohol.

What country are we talking about? Like U.S (21 to drink) or like France (14ish but they really don’t care if you’re 12)
[/quote]

I think he’s talking about the effects, and if he is, I disagree with his statement.[/quote]

Oh well I wouldn’t know.

If it was government controlled there would still be illegal imports of it due to the high amount of taxation that would come with it. If it was limited to public and private companies you’d be getting some shitty stuff that gets you barely high for not long from places like Walmart then a number of expensive small businesses selling good expensive shit. Either way illegal imports would continue (or atleast non regulated). It would benefit a number of states with fertile land and long fields (Cali, etc) and potentially be the next tobacco.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think of weed(Marijuana)

item.title: What do you think of weed(Marijuana)
item.dc:creator: @Phillipe Phillipé
item.description:
@Phillipe wrote:

I’m not fussed about it being legal or illegal, personally I would prefer if they decriminalized it like they do in the Netherlands. For someone like myself who smokes every day, it’d be a lot easier, quicker and simpler to get.

Oh, and it’d help the brilliantly shit economy we have.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think of weed(Marijuana)

item.title: What do you think of weed(Marijuana)
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:56, topic:436015”][quote author=Mack n cheese link=topic=538738.msg3945984#msg3945984 date=1331863249]

weither its legal or not it happens everyday and nothing stops people. Only advantage of it being legal is drug trafficking for marijuana will drop tremendously, crime rates will go down and the world will be a much happier place. but even if they still sold it in stores i personally wouldn’t buy it because i garuante that they will over charge.
[/quote]if it was legal, why the fuck would you buy it? grow your own. IMO that’s probably why it’s NOT legal yet. they’re not sure how to mooch as money out of it as possible…

How many people do you know that grow their own tobacco? Or make their own alcohol? Minuscule to those who use it.[/quote]Well you usually use less tobacco and alcohol than weed, and the prices are much different too

Read full topic

item.source: What do you think of weed(Marijuana)

item.title: What do you think of weed(Marijuana)
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:50, topic:436015”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=538738.msg3944648#msg3944648 date=1331751739]

The thing is, people smoke it for the feeling and people smoke it because it’s ‘cool’.
The people bragging about it most likely smoke because they think it’s ‘cool’.

While i do support legalization for 18+ and not in public i’m not sure if it would turn out very good, as stated before in this thread mass production will happen and quality will go to shit.

I feel pretty much the same way. It should be legal, but still treated as an intoxicant.
[/quote]because as far as i know it intoxicates your blood.

Wait what? I’m pretty sure THC just makes your blood vessels larger and more oxygen is released into the blood stream. That’s why your eyes get red.[/quote]
By ‘Intoxicant’ I meant an extremely psychoactive chemical.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think of weed(Marijuana)
